pageContext.claim: “You look at Opportunity Zones. And then of course, look at, the Opportunity Zones are a tremendous success by the way, not covered. But we did that as, really an experiment. It's most successful. I think it's one of the most successful things ever done for the inner cities.”
pageContext.analysis: The impact of the Opportunity Zones is not yet clear, according to the Tax Foundation. This is in part because key data collection requirements that would be needed to assess the progress were stripped from the final version of the bill.
